message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it's perfect for your needs.  I'm asking $200 to start. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $200 is a bit higher than I was hoping to pay. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. How about we meet halfway at $160? It's a fantastic product that I know you'll be happy with.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $160 is still a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $140. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to be mindful of my expenses.
